item.title: The walkway lights are not working on the ground, 1st and 2nd floors to the right of the main entrance., 20th February
item.description:
Walkway lighting is not working in the Tattersall Close block on the ground, 1st and 2nd floors to the right of the main entra ce. This is causing a potential slip, trip or fall hazard due to the lack of light. It also makes it difficult to unlock the front door as you cannot see the lock easily in the dark.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tattersall Close, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Peckham park road outside the shops, 20th February
item.description:
Peckham park road outside the shops near to old kent road cars park there all the time on double yellow lines & double red lines no enforcement the road gets blocked traffic warned just walk & drive pass it what a joke
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Livesey Place, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement loose, 20th February
item.description:
I have reported this problem before but nothing has been done. The pavement outside 56 Kimberley Road. There is a tree in the same spot so it's difficult to avoid the pavement unless you go into the road which is just as unsafe. My photo is no longer on my phone but I did send a couple the last time I reported this some months ago. It's getting looser and looser by the day. There will be an accident soon, if one hasn't been reported already.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kimberley Road, Edmonton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor cleaning of vomit in stairwell, 20th February
item.description:
After reporting vomit in the stairwell here, I was notified it was "fixed". However, it seems just water was poured atop and not sanitised. A stench remains, please is it possible to sanitise the floor further as this is getting stuck to our shoes.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lordship Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter in bushes and on pavement, 20th February
item.description:
The litter has been building up in these bushes over a number of years without being cleared. It is also spilling out onto the pavement. This is not the responsibility of TfL. Under Section 89 (1) of the Environmental Protection Act 1990, the local authority is responsible for litter clearance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westwood Lane, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: It’s the streetlight outside 5a anglers lane, 20th February
item.description:
The streetlight isn’t working, but when it’s fixed can you please add a shield or guard to the back of the light ? Right the light shines directly into our bedroom (the black house at 5a anglers lane) so it’s actually enjoyable that it doesn’t work- but probably not very safe for people
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5A, Anglers Lane, Kentish Town, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
